divs: sighting detailslocated in the city of chicago around 4200north\800west i was sitting in my apartment that has a window facing west. from this window which is on the 7th floor and completely unobstructed i saw a large bright white object very low and sitting stationary in the sky. this object was not there earlier in the evening nor was it there yesterday. i thought maybe it was a planet because it was so large,low and bright. as i saw this object just sit in the sky,it also did not have any faa lights, windows, noise, markings, structure, it did not move, pulsate or blink. the skies were clear and the object from my point of view was that of a large beachball. it was close in my line of sight from my apartment maybe 1\2 mile out and it was near a brick tower as a point of reference. while this object sat in the sky for at least 20 minutes in the same spot there was alot of aircraft traffic heading towards ohare airport. coming from the south were planes one by one flying underneath and past this object. also in the farther distance you could see the aircraft in the waitng line with them stacked in the sky. then after about 20 mintutes of watching this bright white stationary object it turned into a different color, it turned a deep cherry red, with orange and purple hues. when it started changing colors it started moving in the same spot it looked like a shelled peanut shape. it looked like it twisted in the spot into these colors without changing it original location in the sky. as it changed into these colors and shape it started moving ever so slowly to the right a couple feet and stopped for a minute or so. regular aircraft traffic was still heavy with the same patterns going on. after about a minute or so this red object slowly starting moving staight west still in the same low tragectory towards ohare airport. this red hued object was not blinking or flashing. it was just a red\orange\purple ball of light moving. it took about 10 mintues for what looked like it was right over the airport and then past the horizon. all the while, i could see all the regular air traffic going in and landing. this object from my point of view seemed to be in the middle of all this air traffic.
